title: Fitzcarraldo_Werner Herzog_1982
description:
Fitzcarraldo_1982_West Germany. 

Written, directed and produced by Werner Herzog.
Thomas Mauch-----Kamera.
Music by Popol Vuh, Giuseppe Verdi, Vincenzo Bellini, Richard Strauss.
Featuring recordings of the voice of Enrico Caruso.

Klaus Kinski-----Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald
Claudia Cardinale-----Molly
Jose Lewgoy-----Don Aquilino
Miguel Angel Fuentes-----Cholo the Mechanic
Paul Hittscher-----Capt. Orinoco Paul
Huerequeque Enrique Bohorquez-----Himself as Cook
Jean-Claude Dreyfuss-----Sarah Bernhardt
and others, among which there are many hundreds of Indians of Gran Pajonal, Campas des Rio Tambo and Rio Camisea.

Best Director-Werner Herzog-----Cannes Film Festival 1982.

_NTSC_Color_157 min_1.85:1 Widescreen.
_Audio commentary by Werner Herzog and Co.
_English Dolby Surround.
_German Dolby Surround.
_Optional English subtitles.

DVD9 untouched.
